original_text: i've heard that the fans of the first men in black have come away hating the second one . i wonder why . they felt like the same movie to me .
generated_text:
1. "I was expecting a fresh take on the first Fast and Furious movie, but the sequel felt like more of the same. I left the theater feeling underwhelmed."
2. "The new Star Wars movie was a disappointment. It had the same formula as the previous ones, and I didn't find it exciting or original."
